regex: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, .*
message_cn: Fn::Join后面的参数出错，该参数应包含2个参数，第一个为String,第二个为数组
message_en: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, array[0] must be String, array[1] must be array!

regex: Param .* has no value or default value found!
message_cn: Parameter中的[%1$s]字段没有输入，并且也没有缺省值
message_en: Parameter [%1$s] has no value or default value found!
